description: 共同科英文（二）課程為一學期兩學分課程，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此目標，本課程要求教師盡量用英語上課，努力營造一個豐富的英語環境，讓學生不但有充分機會以英語參與課堂活動，且樂於使用英語與同學及老師溝通。
goals: 1. 增進學生英語溝通表達能力 2. 透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神 3. 透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野 4. 透過課堂討論培養批判精神 5. 提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣
syllabus:
**General English II**

**Spring 2020**

**Friday 3-4/Pu 202**

Instructor: Jessie Shao 邵毓娟                  Email: [ycshao@ntnu.edu.tw](mailto:ycshao@ntnu.edu.tw)

Office: Cheng 808 (誠808)                      Tel: 77491786

**Objectives**: This general English course is designed to enhance students’ reading, writing, listening and speaking skills. Students will be offered the opportunity to develop these 4 language skills along with critical thinking skills by presenting them with ideas from all over the world.

**Required Textbook:** _Keynote 4_

**Course Requirements:**

**Attendance and Participation 25%**

You are expected to work in pairs and in groups. Be a responsible partner. Finish what you need to finish before coming to the class.

Punctual attendance and active participation are required. If you are habitually late, points will be deducted. If you miss the class more than 4 times for no reasons, you will likely fail this course. If you have to miss a class, please inform me and your group partners in advance.

**Midterm: Presentation Project ABC 30%**

依據師大 3分鐘英語簡報競賽規則

(Based on the NTNU 3-minute English Presentation Contest Guidelines)

           一、多元文化議題 (On issues related to multiculturalism)

二、校園生活議題 (On campus life)

三、個人專業學習領域 (On your own major/academic studies)

四、好書分享 (On book(s) you’d like to recommend)

五、其他與學術相關議題 (On academic topics)

Here is what you need to do:

A. Oral Presentation: 3 minutes, **memorized**, 1 slide (no sound), videotaped

B. Written: presentation script + self-evaluation (typed, double-spaced hard copies)

C. Upload 2 digital files to Moodle:

File 1. Presentation script + cloud video link, in Word (File name: Your name, script, and link)

File 2. PowerPoint slides, in PPT (File name: Your name\_ppt)

**Weekly reading and activity worksheets 10%**

**Reading Journals 10%**

        Submit a reading journal for each reading. Typed, double-spaced, hard copy.

The journal should include:

1\. Summary of the reading,

2\. Vocabulary and phrases (definition and example sentences, 6-10 items),

3\. One of the questions that your group has discussed (discussion question and your answer).

**Final Oral Test 15%**

        You are expected to read a passage fluently and answer questions based on the textbook.

**\*Lexile Test 10% \*****請參閱各系英語畢業門檻** **Lexile****分數規定****\* (****沒有校門檻****)**

                           **\*****個人目標**: **比前學期進步** **50** **分**

**Bonus 10%+** Submit a file to illustrate your work at the end of the semester. Include date, activity, and any other details you would like to include.

1\. Participation in English activities on or off campus

例如: 樸 101門口電子看板有答題獎金，樸101內有英語電子資源…，國外大學線上開放課程，英語相關社團活動等

2\. Participation in NTNU 3-minute English Presentation Contest
